original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantaḥ kati āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantaḥ tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
analyzed: akkhāyite sarīre methunam dhammam paṭisevati āpatti pārājikassa

original: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
analyzed: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunam dhammam paṭisevati āpatti thullaccayassa

original: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
analyzed: mukhe acchupantam aṅga jātam paveseti āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevantaḥ imāḥ tissaḥ āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti, sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ
analyzed: tāḥ āpattiyaḥ catunnam vipattīnam kati vipattiyaḥ bhajanti sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam

original: katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi
analyzed: katihi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi

original: samuṭṭhanti, catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ, sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
analyzed: samuṭṭhanti catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam samathānam katihi samathehi

original: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
analyzed: tāḥ āpattiyaḥ catunnam vipattīnam dve vipattiyaḥ bhajanti
siyā sīla vipatti siyā ācāra vipatti
sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam tīhi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā

original: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
analyzed: siyā pārājika āpatti kkhandhena siyā thullaccaya āpatti kkhandhena siyā dukkaṭa āpatti kkhandhena
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhanti na vācataḥ
āpattādhikaraṇa
sattannam samathānam tīhi samathehi

original: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karonto kati āpattiyaḥ āpajjati

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontaḥ ekam āpattim āpajjati

original: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karontaḥ imam ekam āpattim āpajjati
